definition: currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
cut off the feet/rising to a height/towering/bald
unit (forming an entity)/element/(in a residential building) entrance or staircase
Japanese yen (unit of currency)/also written 日圓|日圆

top scorer in the palace examination (highest rank of the Imperial examination system)/see 榜眼[bang3 yan3] and 探花[tan4 hua1]/top scorer in college entrance examination 高考[gao1 kao3]/(fig.) the most brilliantly talented person in the field/leading light
Lantern Festival/night of the 15th of the first lunar month/see also 元夜[yuan2 ye4]/sticky rice dumplings

sentences.english: For example, an electronic book for $30 could be sold to your prospects.
sentences.chinese: 例如，電子書籍可以出售給你30元的前景。

sentences.english: The tolls, which include a government passage tax, varied from $4 to $30 per vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 隧道收費連政府通過稅，每程由4元至30元不等。

sentences.english: Complimentary sampler of our new cream with any $25 purchase.
sentences.chinese: 買滿25元就可以獲贈面霜免費試用裝。

sentences.english: Chapter 4 DC Metadata Application Projection Study It studies Nordic metadata project.
sentences.chinese: 第四章都柏林核心元數據應用項目研究。

sentences.english: However, the fate of teaser , your stock has fallen to 7 yuan.
sentences.chinese: 然而命運捉弄人，你的股票跌到7元了。

sentences.english: He blued 9000 yuan in a holiday.
sentences.chinese: 他一個假期就揮霍了9000元。

sentences.english: The dealer sells each cat for about 50 yuan (US$7.31) to restaurants.
sentences.chinese: 這些貓販子以每隻貓50元人民幣的價格賣給餐館。

sentences.english: I finally reach Leifeng, the entry fee a bargain 40 yuan.
sentences.chinese: 最後我來到雷鋒塔，門票很便宜，只要40元。
第二道特色菜15個才僅僅8元人民幣。

sentences.english: Objective To determine diosgenin content in Jingangteng soft capsule by RP-HPLC.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立金剛藤軟膠囊中薯蕷皁苷元的含量測定方法。

sentences.english: This sort of meta-programming style does not lend itself to static type checking.
sentences.chinese: 這種元程序風格很難進行靜態類型覈查。
你以22元的價格買了一隻股票。

sentences.english: This interdimensional energy has a cohesion to it.
sentences.chinese: 這內次元能量有一個內聚力。

sentences.english: Bar codes, character recognition, machine vision.
sentences.chinese: 條碼，字元識別，機器視覺。

sentences.english: RMB1280 for two person, Get one bottle of Australia Allson Parsons, Whithout 15% surcharge.
sentences.chinese: 兩份1280元，送澳洲富獅紅酒一瓶，免服務費。

definition: to convert into/to amount to/to be equivalent to
